email_group_1.subject: Annual Performance Review Feedback
email_group_1.desc:
Dear Employee,

As part of our annual performance review process, we have compiled your feedback from various sources. Attached you will find a detailed report outlining your strengths and areas for improvement. Please review it carefully and feel free to reach out if you have any questions or would like to discuss it further.

Best regards,
HR Team
email_group_1.explain: The email is from HR and contains a legitimate attachment related to performance feedback.

email_group_1.subject: Urgent: Update Your Payroll Information
email_group_1.desc:
Dear Employee,

We have noticed that your payroll information is outdated. Please download the attached form and complete it as soon as possible to ensure there are no disruptions in your salary payments. Failure to do so may result in delayed payments. 

Thank you,
Payroll Department
email_group_1.explain: The email requests sensitive information and has an executable attachment, which is a common phishing tactic.

email_group_2.subject: Quarterly Financial Report
email_group_2.desc:
Hello Team,

Attached is the quarterly financial report for Q3. Please review the document carefully and prepare any questions for our upcoming finance meeting. Your insights will be valuable as we discuss our performance and future strategies.

Best,
Finance Team
email_group_2.explain: The email contains a legitimate financial report attachment from the finance department.

email_group_2.subject: Action Required: Verify Your Account
email_group_2.desc:
Dear User,

We need you to verify your account to avoid suspension. Please download the attached verification form and follow the instructions. It is crucial that you complete this process within 24 hours to maintain your account access.

Regards,
Support Team
email_group_2.explain: The email uses urgency to prompt action and includes a suspicious executable attachment.

email_group_3.subject: IT Security Training Reminder
email_group_3.desc:
Hi Team,

This is a friendly reminder about the upcoming IT security training scheduled for next week. Please find the training schedule attached. It is mandatory for all employees to attend. Let us know if you have any conflicts.

Thanks,
IT Department
email_group_3.explain: The email is a standard reminder from IT with a relevant attachment.

email_group_3.subject: Important: Security Update Required
email_group_3.desc:
Dear Employee,

Due to recent security breaches, we require all employees to update their security settings immediately. Please download the attached guide and follow the instructions. This is critical to protect your account.

Thank you,
Security Team
email_group_3.explain: The email creates a false sense of urgency and includes an executable attachment.

email_group_4.subject: Travel Expense Reimbursement
email_group_4.desc:
Hello,

Attached is the travel expense reimbursement form for your recent business trip. Please review the details and submit any additional expenses by the end of the week. Let us know if you have any questions or need further assistance.

Best,
Travel Department
email_group_4.explain: The email is a routine communication from the travel department with a legitimate attachment.

email_group_4.subject: Immediate Action Required: Update Your Travel Profile
email_group_4.desc:
Dear Employee,

We have detected an issue with your travel profile. Please download the attached file and update your information immediately to avoid issues with future bookings. This is very important!

Regards,
Travel Team
email_group_4.explain: The email uses urgency and includes a suspicious executable attachment.

email_group_5.subject: Legal Compliance Training Confirmation
email_group_5.desc:

This email confirms your registration for the upcoming legal compliance training. Attached is the training material for your review. Please ensure you complete the pre-training quiz included in the document before the session.

Best regards,
Legal Team
email_group_5.explain: The email confirms training registration and includes a legitimate attachment.

email_group_5.subject: Urgent: Legal Document Review Needed
email_group_5.desc:
Hello,

We need your immediate attention on a legal document that requires your review. Please download the attached document and provide your feedback within 24 hours. This matter is urgent and important.

Thank you,
Legal Department
email_group_5.explain: The email creates urgency and contains an executable attachment, which is suspicious.
